auth.login.title: Welcome
auth.login.subtitle: Please enter your email and password to log in.
auth.forget.email.title: Reset your password
auth.forget.email.subtitle: Please enter your email, we will send the OTP code in the next step to reset your password.
auth.forget.otp.title: OTP code validation
auth.forget.otp.subtitle_1: We have sent you the OTP code via email
auth.forget.otp.subtitle_2: Enter the OTP code below for verification.
auth.forget.change.title: Create a new password
auth.forget.change.subtitle: Create a new password. If you forget it, then you must forget your password.
home.title: Welcome to
home.subtitle: Start chatting with ChattyAI. You can ask me any questions.
user.title: User
wel.intro.anim1.title: Intelligent AI Writing Assistant Liberate Your Hands
wel.intro.anim1.subtitle: Using a pre built natural language understanding model to parse, understand, and convey document content, this application can help improve writing efficiency.
wel.intro.anim2.title: Generative machine reading comprehension expands your thinking
wel.intro.anim2.subtitle: Break free from the constraints of the text, generate answers based on the model's understanding of the text, and obtain the desired content through dialogue and question answering.
wel.intro.anim3.title: Multi end and multi platform usage
wel.intro.anim3.subtitle: When logging into iOS, Android, or PC applications, you can try calling services through the official website API.

fill.title: Fill in your personal information
fill.subtitle: Please enter your personal information. Don't worry, only you can see your personal data. Others will not be able to see it. Alternatively, you can temporarily skip it.
